entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:39 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 09:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 47 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: SSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Periods of rain beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to ice pellets near midnight then to periods of light snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
